reasoning: Umbrella term covering benign and malignant pancreatic tumors. Reporting primarily malignant pancreatic cancer incidence at ~7.5 per 100k from GLOBOCAN 2005 data. Benign neoplasms are less well documented. Confidence reduced due to heterogeneity of term.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
